snippet: The decision was a victory, for now, for the players, but it did not affect the punishments given to Saints coaches or the general manager.
abstract: Appeals panel vacates suspensions of four NFL players punished in New Orleans Saints bounty scandal; decision represents a huge temporary victory for the players--Jonathan Vilma, Will Smith, Scott Fujita and Anthony Hargrove--who are immediately reinstated by Commissioner Roger Goodell.
lead_paragraph: The decision was a victory, for now, for the players, but it did not affect the punishments given to Saints coaches or the general manager.

headline.seo: Suspensions of Players in Saints’ Bounty Scandal Overturned
headline.main: Suspensions Vacated for Players in Bounty Case
headline.print_headline: Suspensions Vacated for Players in Bounty Case
